name: Adonis
description:
Adonis is a stylized, whimsical and colorful single player adventure that has both challenging and relaxed gameplay elements!

Features:

* Single player combat vs. a variety of AI and bosses

* Intriguing and plot twisting quests

* Build structures & craft items during your adventure

* Stylized, colorful environments

* A multitude of voice-acted characters

* Lootable items (tiered by rarity)

Get ready for an unforgettable journey!
